Uses of Interface
flex2.linker.LinkerConfiguration

  • Packages that use LinkerConfiguration 
    Package Description
    flex2.compiler.common  
    flex2.linker  
    flex2.tools  
    flex2.tools.oem.internal  

    • Uses of LinkerConfiguration in flex2.compiler.common

      Classes in flex2.compiler.common that implement LinkerConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Configuration
      Tools like mxmlc and compc use configuration objects to store configuration options parsed from config files and command-line options.

    • Uses of LinkerConfiguration in flex2.linker

      Constructors in flex2.linker with parameters of type LinkerConfiguration 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleMovie(LinkerConfiguration configuration)
      MD5 password is no longer needed for Flash Player.

    • Uses of LinkerConfiguration in flex2.tools

      Classes in flex2.tools that implement LinkerConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommandLineConfiguration
      Support for command line specific configuration options, like -file-specs, -help, -include-resource-bundles, -load-config, -output, -projector, and -version.
      class  CompcConfiguration
      compc specific configuration.
      class  ToolsConfiguration
      Common base class for most tool specific configurations.

    • Uses of LinkerConfiguration in flex2.tools.oem.internal

      Classes in flex2.tools.oem.internal that implement LinkerConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ApplicationCompilerConfiguration
      A configuration that extends ToolsConfiguration by adding options for -file-specs, -include-resource-bundles, -load-config, and -projector.
      class  LibraryCompilerConfiguration
      A configuration that extends CompcConfiguration by adding options for -loadConfig and -compute-digest.
      class  LinkerConfiguration
      A configuration that extends ToolsConfiguration by adding link specific options.
      Methods in flex2.tools.oem.internal with parameters of type LinkerConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void LinkerConfiguration.setOriginalConfiguration(LinkerConfiguration original, Set args, Set<String> includes, Set<String> excludes)
